Absolutely amazing.

I highly recommend getting this game; It is fast paced, good story-line, many weapons to choose from in a certain situation instead always having to use the same weapon most of the time and the NPCs have good path finding and gameplay.

Pretty fun game, I've always wanted to play the halflife series and I am not disapointed. The game can get a little annoying but for the most part I have loved this game.
Good Game. Ending section is kind of tough but this is a great game.
why am I playing afraid of monsters?

No hay mucho que pueda decir de este juego que no se haya dicho ya; el ambiente, diseño de escenarios y enemigos son excelentes. Estoy 100% seguro que ningún juego me ha mantenido tan tenso como lo ha hecho Half Life. Eso sí, vaya JODIDO boss final mas aburrido y tedioso wn

Es un buen rato, lo recomiendo.
Fun Game, can be a pain in the ass at times.  Wish  I played the remake but this on was $2 dollars.  Off to half Life 2, Which i think is more fun.

My first PC game ever. Played it for the first time maybe in 1999/2000. Great classics with some innovations for the time it was released(like interaction with different objects,  like boxes, barrels, cuos ,etc.)

Purchased this and HF2 + Alyx so i could play through all of them in order.
HF1 is a pain but for a game that was published at its time its very interactive & fun.
U get stuck at some levels and have to follow walkthroughs but other than that its good.

Eski olmasına rağmen Metacritic'de yeni oyunlara taş çıkartan, arada bi nostalji için girilebilecek efsane oyun. İyi oynayanlarını bulursanız anında nikahı basın o kişi sizi sever arkadaşlar. Ayrıca Valve'nin 3'e ganizi var sanırım hiç bir serisinde 3. oyunu göremiyoruz maalesef. Umarım ölmeden önce tam anlamı ile 3. oyunu oynamak nasip olur.

jogo belissimo e graficos realistas para 2021
El que no jugó Crossfire y activó la bomba no tuvo infancia.

Me encanta, se puede pasear por todo el mapa y tiene muy buena historia, si no cumplis el objetivo no avanzas, a veces por no prestar atencion a lo que dicen los cientificos he tenido que ver tutoriales en youtube, pero el juego esta muy bueno incluso hoy en 2021, los graficos se quedaron un poco atras pero la trama, incluso me he asustado en ocasiones que me salieron monstruos por detras, es un gran excito y un orgullo para valve.
для 1998 года игра хорошая но сложная не для всех мне зашло

mmmmm game is ku,

honest review:
i personally enjoyed this game a lot and its story, i see why people enjoy this series so much and want a third sequel. though if im being honest it is an alright game, not saying its terrible! but idk my taste is a bit different dont get me wrong i love valve games tbh and all of their classic titles. again it was a fun game to play through and i highly recommend it if, you enjoy platform games or interesting stories. 
9/10 

time to play half life 2 wooo

great game until the only 2 bosses. One gets bugged often and you can't kill it sometimes. so you have to blow open the floor with explosives, nades etc to get to the next level. The other boss is just annoying and bad. Besides that, great game.

First half was very good, then feels dragged out towards the end.
Ending levels honestly are terrible.
multiplayer is fun if u dont suck

This is a legendary game, it was a before and after in shooter and it showed that you can tell a story in a shooter that is something more than "kill everything that moves" and it gets even better, without half life valve would not have emerged, And there would be no steam with all the changes in gaming that would have. This was the first shooter I played, crossfire was the first multiplayer game that I played on the internet in a game, I played with a friend the crossfire map, and the first weapon I took was the tau cannon, 16 years have passed from that day and the The hype I felt when I played it for the first time is something I will never forget.
Le jeu est très bien scripté pour 1998, de bonnes scènes d'action y sont présentes. Le jeu nous plonge dans les années 90 et dans un univers extraordinaire.
good game what more to say really
I do really like the challenge of the game and i love the game play its a good mix of combat and puzzles
